name: Jason Lopez
title: Senior QA Automation Engineer
aboutMe_details_1: Senior QA Engineer with over 7 years of experience, focused on continuous improvement and innovation. Skilled in API, automation, mobile, and performance testing, backed by certifications in ISTQB and Scrum Master. I thrive in agile and dynamic environments, promoting teamwork to achieve outstanding results. I am fluent in English, and support teams to accomplish their objectives.
aboutMe_details_3: Distributed environments | Microservices | Cloud-based applications | Banking and Insurance applications | Startup environment | Databases | Continuous Integration | AWS EC2 | AWS S3 | AWS RDS
